meanings.definition: A raised platform used for displaying a coffin during a funeral.
meanings.sent1: The catafalques stood solemnly in the center of the room.
meanings.sent2: The funeral procession moved slowly, carrying the catafalques with care.
meanings.sent3: During the funeral, a cat jumped onto the catafalques, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The catafalques seemed to carry the weight of sorrow in its sturdy structure.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the catafalques made it a focal point of the service.

meanings.definition: A decorative structure used to support a coffin during a funeral procession.
meanings.sent1: People marveled at the ornate details of the catafalques as it passed by.
meanings.sent2: The flowers adorned the catafalques beautifully during the somber event.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the catafalques was a magical castle on wheels.
meanings.sent4: The weight of grief seemed lighter as the catafalques carried the coffin with grace.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight reflected off the catafalques, creating a solemn glow.
